law.catch_line: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum to do business....

text.section: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum to do business.
The Board shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

Each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation in accordance with the budget of the Board; and
Reimbursement for expenses at a rate determined by the Board.

section.section: The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the budget of the Board.
The Board may designate 1 of its staff as an executive director.
